name: ZeroHourJam_Dinosaur
description:
A game made in 0 hour for the Zero Hour Jam 2021 !

The theme we took was "Dinosaur"

Edit : Small edit postcompo to make it playable in a smartphone.

Sounds from freesound.org made by scuzzpuck, hallek, 123agumon, scorepion, inspectorj, garuda1982 and bulldozia.
